title: Pareto Analysis (80/20 Rule)
description: An agent must perform a Pareto analysis on sales data to identify the top 20% of products that generate 80% of revenue.

tasks.description: Load product sales data, including product ID and total revenue per product.
Sort the products by revenue in descending order and calculate the cumulative revenue percentage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the cumulative revenue.

tasks.description: Identify the products that fall within the top 80% of cumulative revenue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of the most profitable products.

tasks.description: Generate a report stating which products represent the 'vital few' according to the Pareto principle.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a clear summary of the analysis.
